benchmark_details.name: DOMAIN EVAL
benchmark_details.overview: DOMAIN EVAL is a multi-domain code generation benchmark designed to evaluate LLMs' coding capabilities thoroughly across six domains, providing insights into their strengths and weaknesses.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive benchmark for comparing and assessing the code generation abilities of LLMs in various coding domains.

data.source: Collected from GitHub repositories focusing on various coding domains
data.annotation: Automated generation of test cases and subjects from code repositories

methodology.calculation: The metrics are calculated based on the accuracy of generated code against test cases.
methodology.interpretation: Higher Pass@k scores indicate better code generation capabilities of the LLMs.
